item.title: TeamCity Pipeline - iteration two
item.description: Now I have had the TeamCity build pipeline running for a while I have had chance to review how it works.

item.title: Create branch based NuGet packages in TeamCity
item.description: As I was reviewing the TeamCity build configuration I’d setup with my colleagues, it was pointed out every build was creating a new NuGet package.

item.title: How I work with Git
item.description: I really enjoy introducing people to Git. Pretty much without fail they see how much better their development work-flow can be and find their work more enjoyable as a result.

item.title: TeamCity Build Pipeline
item.description: It has been a while since I setup a build configuration in TeamCity.
